title: Site-suitability analysis and the graphical modeler
project_summary: A tutorial on how to perform a simple site suitability analysis in QGIS to find ind suitable sites for building a commercial area for students in the province of Albay based on the following criteria: (1) within 3 km from a primary road and (2) within 3 km from an existing school. It also includes a tutorial on how to use the graphical modeler in order to easily make the process automateable and replicable.

title: Network analysis in QGIS
project_summary: A tutorial on how to perform different kinds of network analyis in QGIS including: computing the shortest/fastest distance between two points, the service area of services, or the places that can be reached after a certain amount of time. The tutorial utilizes the built-in network analysis algorithms in QGIS as well as other plugins and providers that provide network analysis capabilities to QGIS such as the GRASS v.net.* algorithms and processing plugins such as QNEAT and ORS Tools.
themes_keywords: network analysis, transportation, service area, vector data, isochrones
algorithms: network analysis, shortest path, fastest path, origin-destination, isochrones
